snippet: The Knicks came to Madison Square Garden to bury the Boston Celtics — but the Celtics came to play.
abstract: Boston Celtics appear to have risen from the dead in their first-round playoff series against New York Knicks, with five players scoring double digits, team hitting 11 of 22 3-point shots and outrebounding the Knicks, 41-39, in 92-86 win in Game 5.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks came to Madison Square Garden to bury the Boston Celtics — but the Celtics came to play.

headline.seo: Celtics Let Knicks Know They’re Not Dead Yet
headline.main: Celtics Take Exception to Comments and Color
headline.print_headline: Celtics Take Exception To Comments And Color
